title: Users to add in the chat.

first_name.title: The first name of the user.

last_name.title: The last name (surname) of the user.

username.title: The username that will be used when sending messages.

secret.title: The secret (password) used for this user.

email.title: The email of the user. Needs to follow standard email formats (example@ex.com).

avatar.title: The picture used as an avatar. Not implemented at the moment.
